sentences.english: We must get early warning systems in place everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須在各地設有早期預警系統。

sentences.english: We have set up early warning systems for frosts and shelters for animals.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經建立了霜凍預警系統，爲動物建立了庇護所。

sentences.english: To realize the strick precaution of the marketing crisis, forewarning system should be studied, especially the forewarning index.
sentences.chinese: 而要實現對營銷危機的防範就要建立營銷預警系統。

sentences.english: Main also says that the system is likely to be applicable only to some quake zones.
sentences.chinese: 麥恩還說，預警系統似乎只能應用於某些地震帶。

sentences.english: But monitoring disease is just one aspect of creating an early-warning system.
sentences.chinese: 但是監測疾病只是建立一個早期預警系統的一方面。

sentences.english: Other early warning systems used in parts of Africa provide only several weeks to prepare.
sentences.chinese: 早前在非洲使用的預警系統只能提前數週進行預報。

sentences.english: Good results have been made in potato late blight warning system and the control of plant diseases and pests.
sentences.chinese: 馬鈴薯晚疫病預警系統建設和綜合防治取得顯著成效。

sentences.english: Red is the maximum in a four-colour warning system.
sentences.chinese: 紅色是四級顏色預警系統中最嚴重的。

sentences.english: Section two is the supporting system of the EWS.
sentences.chinese: 第二章上海市金融危機預警系統外部支持系統。

sentences.english: The main content of the tsunami pre-warning system is also briefly introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 同時簡單地介紹了海嘯預警系統的主要內容。

sentences.english: The development of landslide and mud-flow early warning system inZhaotong prefecture is described.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了昭通地區滑坡泥石流預警系統的由來與建立。

definition: Kanting township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Wantan township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
